greeting.title: Location App
greeting.paragraph: App to searching location from IP or URL.

info.text: The website is in the HTTPS protocol and the request to the ipstack.com API in the free version is HTTP. This generates the „Mixed Content” error.
info.stepOne: To display the page correctly, follow these steps (Chrome browser):
info.stepTwo: => click on the „padlock” next to the URL
info.stepFour: => „Dangerous content” - dropdown the list and click on „Allow”
info.stepFive: => Refresh the page and click „Get started”
